tha-ap371:0.3_0: I declare this to the senior by speaking,
tha-ap371:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
tha-ap371:2.3_0: I took a flower from its flowers,
tha-ap371:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap371:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap371:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nimitta.
